Detailed Description

This class offers methods to make a file header.

Member Function Documentation

const wxString wxExHeader::Get ( const wxExFileName *  filename) const

Returns a file header for specified filename, using it's lexer and data from config, among which the file purpose.

bool wxExHeader::InfoNeeded ( ) const

Returns true if you should do ShowDialog to get more info, and not yet do a Get.
